https://allergyguide.ca/.title: Homepage

https://allergyguide.ca/about/.body:
Our goals
To create a comprehensive resident-led and faculty reviewed website for high-yield and pragmatic information about most things allergy & immunology, meant to help residents in clinic. In particular:

  
    
Sections for major conditions, including copy-pasteable macros and practical pearls
Sections for therapies and medications
Clinical decision tools
Patient resources (a one stop shop for handouts!)


  

Secondary goals (if time permits)

Set of questions for RC studying
Critical appraisal of new research
Patient resources translated into different languages

The editors
[insert macros for portraits and descriptions]

Are we sponsored?
... not yet!
Technical mumbo-jumbo
This site is open-source and hosted on GitHub. It is built using the excellent static website generator Zola, with the Abridge theme.

https://allergyguide.ca/privacy/.body:
Privacy

We are not particularly interested in your data (it'd be weird if we were!).
This site does not set or use cookies.
This site does not store data in the browser to be shared, sent, or sold to third-parties.
No personal information is shared, sent, or sold to third-parties.

text_image_to_right
{ { text_image_to_right(text="# Here is some text on the left.", src="/images/example.jpg", alt="An image description", caption = "test caption") }}

  
    Here is some text on the left.

  
  
    
    
    test caption

    
  
widget_penfast
{ { widget_penfast() }}




  
    
      
      
        
          PEN-FAST
        
      
    
    
      F
        - Five years or less since reaction
      
        
          
          
        
      
    
    
      A
        - Anaphylaxis or angioedema
      
        
          
          
        
      
    
    
      
        S
        - Severe cutaneous adverse reaction
      
      
        
          
          
        
      
    
    
      T
        - Treatment recieved for reaction (or unsure)
      
        
          
          
        
      
    
    
      
        
          CALCULATED RISK:
